steps.name: Before Each Hook
Log out and open the Home page
Open https://staging.prolinker.com/
Log in as recipient user
Click "LOG IN"
Enter email: AQA-CI-GUzWm-750-U-Recip-IEcZM@mailsac.com
Enter password: AQA-CI-GUzWm-750-U-Recip-IEcZM
Click "LOG IN"
Verify that the user is logged
Follow the link from the mail: https://staging.prolinker.com/account/organization/invite?token=f4ab0232ad527e2924127aa95e73b29f260eb972ua0
Check invitation message
Verify that the message contain AQA-CI-GUzWm-750-U-Send-IEcZM 19255
Verify that the organization name is AQA-CI-GUzWm-750-U-Send-IEcZM
Click "ACCEPT"
Open https://staging.prolinker.com/account/settings/organization
Verify that the full name of the 0 user is AQA-CI-GUzWm-750-U-Send-IEcZM 19255
Verify that the role of the 0 user is Account holder
Verify that the full name of the 1 user is AQA-CI-GUzWm-750-U-Recip-IEcZM 90810
Verify that the role of the 1 user is Agent
Verify that the pending invitation has disappeared
